description:
Kaname Sudou, an ordinary high school student, receives an invitation email to try a mysterious app called "Darwin's Game." Kaname, upon launching the app, is drawn into a game where players fight one another using superpowers called Sigils. Without knowing the reason for all this, can Kaname survive furious battles against the powerful players who attack him?

(Source: Aniplex of America)

Note: The first episode aired with a runtime of ~48 minutes as opposed to the standard 24 minute long episode.

tags.name: Death Game
tags.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Augmented Reality
tags.description: Prominently features events with augmented reality as the main setting.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Gangs
tags.description: Centers around gang organizations.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Gambling
tags.description: Centers around the act of gambling.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

alternative: アレクセイ・ベルジェンニコフ

node.description:
Doujin circle consisting of ぎんこ (Ginko) and 高畑ゆき (Takahata Yuki).  Stylized as FLIPFLOPs  They are the authors of Nekogami Yaoyorozu ( 猫神やおよろず) published in Akita Shoten's "Champion RED Ichigo" magazine, and Sekaiju no Meikyuu II (世界樹の迷宮2～六花の少女～ ) in Ichijinsha's "Comic REX"

[Twitter 1](https://twitter.com/takahata_yuki) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/a_ginkgo) | [Official Website](http://blog.flipflops.jp/)

__Hometown:__ Saitama City, Saitama Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Omiya Koryo High School and SHOBI College of Music

[Profile (One Music)](https://one-music.jp/suehiro/index.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kenichiro_s) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kenichiro.suehiro)

A Japanese pianist, composer, and arranger.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

__[Website](http://www.ayanomashiro.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ma_shi_ron) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ayanomashiro)__

Mashiro Ayano pre-debuted in volume 17 of LisAni! (May 2014 issue) as Mashiro in "Wingless Diver," as well as volume 18 (August 2014 issue) in "Setsuna Chronicle (刹那クロニクル)." She major-debuted in singing _Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works_ (TV) OP "ideal white" in October 2014.
5th Anisong Grand Prix Finalist with Konomi Suzuki. As Asuka Ookura, she performed Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo ED2 "Prime Number" on February 2013.
